## VENUS don't need Flash and DDR Chip info
########For UBI Device IMAGE #############
## ubinize â€” a tool for generating UBI images
## UBINIZE_ARGS is determined by Flash Chip
# 
# -m, --min-io-size=bytes.  Minimum input/output unit size of the flash in bytes
# -p --min-io-size=bytes.  Minimum input/output unit size of the flash in bytes
# -s, --sub-page-size=bytes.  Minimum input/output unit used for UBI headers,
#  e.g. sub-page size in case of NAND flash (equivalent to the minimum input/output unit size by default).
UBINIZE_ARGS = -m 2048 -p 128KiB -s 2048
